rdt.model

Class Ensemble

  • java.lang.Object
    • rdt.model.Ensemble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchEnsemble, MultilabelChainEnsemble, QuantilEnsemble

    public abstract class Ensemble
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model
    Class to represent a model which is an ensemble of trees. A tree-builder is used to create the trees. To perform a prediction the predict(...) method of all trees are called and these predictions are merged to produce the final prediction.
    Author:
    MK

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ensemble(CollectorPreferences cp, TreeBuilder treeBuilder, int numTrees)
      Create a new Ensemble with the specified learning tasks, which are given by the CollectorPreferences, the given tree-builder which will be used to build to trees and the given number of trees in the ensemble.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Builds the model with the given instances.
      CollectorPreferences getCollectorPreferences()
      Returns the information about the learning tasks which are performed by the model.
      Tree[] getTrees()
      Returns all the trees of the ensemble.
      Collector[] predict(weka.core.Instance inst)
      Makes a prediction for the given instance.

      • Ensemble

        public Ensemble(CollectorPreferences cp,
                TreeBuilder treeBuilder,
                int numTrees)
        Create a new Ensemble with the specified learning tasks, which are given by the CollectorPreferences, the given tree-builder which will be used to build to trees and the given number of trees in the ensemble.
        Parameters:
        cp - the information about the learning tasks
        treeBuilder - the tree-builder to create the trees
        numTrees - the number of trees which will be created

      • predict

        public Collector[] predict(weka.core.Instance inst)
                    throws RDTException
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Makes a prediction for the given instance. The prediction is represented as an array of collectors. Each collector represents one specific learning-task, which have been specified in the initialization process of this instance.
        Specified by:
        predict in interface Model
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance for which the prediction will be computed
        Returns:
        An array of collectors which contain the prediction for each specific learning task.
        Throws:
        RDTException
